parameters.query: ={{ "SELECT id, nom, prenom, email, telephone, statut, source, notes, date_contact, created_at, updated_at FROM leads WHERE id = '" + $json.leadId + "'" }}
={{ "UPDATE leads SET statut = 'contacte', updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = '" + $('02. Parser Payload').first().json.leadId + "' RETURNING id, nom, prenom, statut" }}
